title: Smart Grant: AI for Healthcare Diagnostics
description: Develop AI-powered diagnostic tools for early disease detection. Funding for innovative SMEs working on machine learning applications in healthcare. Must demonstrate technical feasibility and market potential.
eligibility: UK SME with <250 employees, innovative project, 30% grant funding

title: Smart Grant: Clean Energy Storage Solutions
description: Innovative energy storage technologies for renewable energy systems. Seeking projects that address grid-scale storage challenges with novel battery chemistry or mechanical storage systems.
eligibility: UK registered company, demonstrable innovation, commercial potential

title: NIHR AI for Health and Care Award
description: Artificial intelligence and data-driven research to transform health and social care. Projects must demonstrate clear pathway to NHS implementation and patient benefit.
eligibility: NHS partnership required, ethical approval needed, patient involvement

title: EIC Accelerator: Deep Tech Innovation
description: EU funding for breakthrough innovations with global market potential. Open to high-risk, high-impact deep tech projects in any sector. Mix of grant (€2.5M) and equity (€15M).
eligibility: SME from EU or associated countries, TRL 5-8, disruptive innovation

title: SBRI: NHS Digital Solutions
description: Small Business Research Initiative competition for innovative digital health solutions. Phase 1: Feasibility (£100k, 6 months). Phase 2: Development (£1M, 24 months).
eligibility: Any UK business, novel solution to NHS challenge, rapid development
